title: 5. Binary Search
content: class Solution { public int search(int[] nums, int target) { int i = 0, j = nums.length - 1; while (i <= j) { int m = i + (j - i) / 2; // (j + i) / 2 migth cause integer out of bound if (nums[m] == target) { return m; } if (nums[m] < target) { i = m + 1; } else { j = m - 1; } } return -1; } } Time: O(logn) Space: O(1)
